text: The Sand Pebbles is a 1966 American war adventure drama movie directed by Robert Wise and was based on the 1962 novel of the same name by Richard McKenna. It stars Steve McQueen, Richard Attenborough, Richard Crenna, Candice Bergen, Mako Iwamatsu, Marayat Andriane, Ford Rainey, Simon Oakland, Gavin MacLeod and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 8 Academy Awards in 1967. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1966 war movies Category:1966 adventure movies Category:1966 drama movies Category:American war movies Category:American adventure movies Category:1960s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Wise
title: The Sand Pebbles (movie)
